Posts.Content: Hi, Metastasis refers to the spread of melanoma to different body parts, typically the bones, liver, lungs and brain.Treatm ent for metastatic breasts cancers is lifelong and focuses on control of the illness and quality of life. Young people, as well as men, can be diagnosed with metastatic breasts cancers. There are no definitive prognostic statistics for metastatic breasts cancers. Every patient and their illness is unique.
Posts.Title: 26 and have Metastatic Breast Cancer to Lung
